solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean hasPathSum(TreeNode root, int sum) {--newline--        if(root == null) return false;--newline--    --newline--        if(root.left == null && root.right == null && sum - root.val == 0) return true;--newline--    --newline--        return hasPathSum(root.left, sum - root.val) || hasPathSum(root.right, sum - root.val);--newline--    }--newline--}
